content: http.HandleFunc("/resources/spirit", func(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { data := "" if true { roleId, _ := strconv.ParseInt(r.FormValue("roleId"), 10, 64) t, _ := strconv.ParseInt(r.FormValue("serverId"), 10, 32) serverId := int32(t) userId, _ := strconv.Atoi(r.FormValue("userId")) data = service.Spirit(serverId, userId, roleId) } //res,_	:= json.Marshal(data) 	//log.Printf("客户端请求智能体:/resources/spirit %+v, %s\n", r, data) 	w.Write([]byte(data)) })
